price: Exceto do que Allah quiser. - Por certo, Ele sabe o declarado e o que se oculta -
arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: illā mā shāa al-lahu innahu yaʿlamu al-jahra wamā yakhfā
